description: Almost all weather is in this region.
The ozone layer is in this layer.
Meteors burn up in this layer
Aurora and satellites occur in this layer.

This dynamic region grows and shrinks based on solar conditions and divides further into the sub-regions: The ionosphere is a critical link in the chain of Sun-Earth interactions. This region is what makes radio communications possible.
It extends from the top of the thermosphere up to 10,000 km
